channel.title: Tokul point system?
channel.description:
hi is there anyway to make a system that every hour you are onine you get 1 tokul and to get that point you must talk to a special npc so that you cant just afk for your points and how would i make a shop for those
this is a 317

item.description:
@chromeblade0 wrote:

all i would like to know is how to make it so when i talk to an npc it gives me 1 tokul
i know how to do the rest

Read full topic

item.title: Tokul point system?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

A few issues with this problem.

You have pointed out the revision, but not the base. Please post which base you are using to be more accurate.

What you are asking for is in one big bunch.

  1. Make an NPC
  2. Talk to the NPC
  3. Not be able to AFK for tokkul
  4. How to add Tokkul to the inventory/bank
  5. If inventory is full, put in bank or vice-versa
  6. How to make a shop
  7. How to open that shop
  8. How to claim tokkul from that shop for free

The best way to solve this problem is to break it up into pieces. Solve the small problems one by one and you will have this done in no time!

Read full topic
